InstructionData.Title: GMC - Gas Mixer Control
InstructionData.Author: Unknown
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Gas Mixer Control alias GasSensor d0 alias Mixer d1
alias pressure r0 alias poweron r1
define MAXPRESSURE 1000 init: s Mixer Setting 80
loop: l pressure GasSensor Pressure s db Setting pressure sle poweron pressure MAXPRESSURE s Mixer On poweron yield j loop
